content: अर्वांच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अवरे काले देशे वा अंचति पृषो° अर्वादेशः] {@--1@} Coming hitherward (<ab>opp.</ab> परांच्). {@--2@} Turned towards coming to meet any one. {@--3@} Being on this side (as the bank of a river); (<ab>opp.</ab> पर). {@--4@} Being below or behind (in time or place). {@--5@} Following, subsequent. --क् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Hitherward, on this side. {@--2@} From a certain point. {@--3@} Before (in time or place); यत्सृष्टेरर्वाक् सलिलमयं ब्रह्मांडमभूत् <ls>K. 125</ls>; अर्वाक् संवत्सरात्स्वामी हरेत परतो नृपः <ls>Y. 2. 173</ls>, <ls n="Y. 2.">113</ls>; <ls n="Y.">1. 254</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 30</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 59.</ls> {@--4@} On the lower side, behind, downwards (<ab>opp.</ab> ऊर्ध्वं). {@--5@} Afterwards, subsequently. {@--6@} (With <ab>loc.</ab>) Within, near; एते चार्वागुपवनभुवि छिन्नदर्भांकुरायां . <ls>Ś. 1. 15.</ls>
